Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2016 12:16PM rad123 wrote: Hello, I am Stage3A diagnosed October. Oncologist said 4 AC treatments and 4 Taxol, i have completed 4 AC and 2 taxol. For 3rd taxol within 5min i had allergic reaction breath shortening, immediately they stopped medicine and gave supplement oxygen and checked vitals. After 15 min i was back to normal. Just want to check if any one had any allergic reactions for 3 taxol?  I appreciate your feed back and answers.  rad123
Posts.Title: side effects/allergic reactions azrescue rad123
